nodes.bodyText:
I think all the single-line create methods can now be inlined.
For the FieldColumn, it might make sense to remove the second argument (as this is also extracted from the columnModel, and thus can be done in the constructor (or maybe move the field parsing to the columnModel and replace the getQualifier by getFields).

I tried inlining the create* methods, but I realized that this made the constructor very hard to read. I really would prefer to keep the methods, even though they could be removed.
The MainTableColumnModel works independently from Field, since it also displays an index column. I moved the FieldFactory.parseOrFields into the FieldColumn-class.
